title: Gab and Juls: How the Premier League took over
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens reflect on 30 years of the Premier League, explain how it became the biggest league in the world and wonder if it really is more competitive than its European rivals. There's also a dive into Nations League defeats for France, England, and Spain, and much more in quick hits.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Premier League's dominance, Europe's elites struggle, Argentina and Brazil look dangerous
